mapper.update: update JMF_CONFIG_QMGR set `HOST` = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{port,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUEUE_MANAGER = #{queueManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `CCSID` = #{ccsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where QM_ID = #{qmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select QM_ID, `HOST`, PORT, QUEUE_MANAGER, CHANNEL, `CCSID`, NOTE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_CONFIG_QMGR
